lines.text: A division of Hassan's Elite Guard is closing in on our position. The probability of a favourable outcome can be increased, if we are able to fall back to your main base and engage the enemy as we move.
I am the future. The Tiberian Sun has risen!
It would be a sad error in judgement to mistake me for a corpse.
As long as he lives long enough to tell me where Vega is!
[McNeil finds a monitor with Kane on it explaining to him about Jake's fate]
I am sorry to hear about your dear brother. He died in a slow,yet painful death.
